Api.EMAIL_REGISTERED_UNVERIFIED: Email has been registered, but not verified
Api.LOGIN_FAIL_ACCOUNT_NOT_EXIST: Login failed, account does not exist
Api.LOGIN_FAIL_EMAIL_UNVERIFIED: Login failed, email is not authenticated

Validation.isAlphaDash: {property} can only contain letters, numbers, dashes or underscores
Validation.isDateString: {property} must be a valid ISO 8601 date string
Validation.isIn: {property} must be one of the following values: {constraint1}
Validation.isLength: {property} must be greater than or equal to {constraint1} and less than or equal to {constraint2}
Validation.maxLength: {property} must be less than or equal to {constraint1} characters
Validation.minLength: {property} must be longer than or equal to {constraint1} characters
